mean_cn: v. 赞扬，歌颂，表扬，称赞；  n. 称赞，赞美，赞美的话
mean_en: to say or write good things about (someone or something) :to express approval of (someone or something)
word_etyma: prais价值，评价+e→称其有很高价值，给以很高评价→praise称赞，赞美，赞扬，颂扬
sentence: Mary would always praise her students whenever they made an extra effort.
sentence_trans: 玛丽总会在她的学生们特别努力时表扬他们。
